Pre-set-up on HostÔÉÅ

Open a serial terminal program (tera term or minicom) on a PC/Laptop with 115,200 baudrate, 8 bits, no flow control, and no parity.

User will need to uninstall/disable the libUSBK explicitly to run AT commands using any serial terminal from a Windows machine. Once libUSBK is uninstalled, check the driver from the device manager.

Figure 3: Device Manager
